create_form ( &$  Options  ) 

Function draws record creation form.

Parameters:
$Options - Execution parameters.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 394 of file default_views.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $Options->get_setting( 'default_form' , 1 ) == 0 )
                        {
                              call_user_func( array( $this->Provider , 'create_form' ) , $Options );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $FormTemplate = $Options->get_setting( 'form_template' , 'create_form' ).'.tpl';
                              $Form = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( $Options->get_setting( 'file_path' ) , $FormTemplate );
                              $Form = str_replace( '{state}' , 'create_record' , $Form );
                              if( $Options->get_setting( 'get_post_extraction_script' , false ) )
                              {
                                    $ExtractionScript = $Options->get_setting( 'get_post_extraction_script' );
                                    $Record = $this->Security->parse_http_parameters( $ExtractionScript );
                                    $Form = $this->String->print_record( $Form , $Record );
                              }
                              $this->Provider->Output = $Form;
                        }
                        
                        $this->process_form( $Options , $this->Provider->Output );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $DataProvider = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_data_provider( $Options , $this->Provider );
                        
                        $FunctionName = $Options->get_setting( 'select_func' , 'select' );

                        $Condition = $this->get_select_condition( $Options );
                        
                        $Records = call_user_func( 
                              array( $DataProvider , $FunctionName ) , false , false , false , false , $Condition
                        );
                        
                        list( $Header , $Item , $Footer ) = $this->get_grid_templates( $Options );
                        
                        $Items = '';
                        
                        foreach( $Records as $i => $Record )
                        {
                              $Items .= $this->String->print_record( $Item , $Record );
                        }
                        
                        $this->Provider->Output = $Header.$Items.$Footer;
                  }

Definition at line 645 of file default_views.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Header = $Options->get_setting( 'header' , '' );
                        if( $Header !== '' )
                        {
                              $Header = dirname( $Options->get_setting( 'file_path' ) )."/res/templates/$Header.tpl";
                              $Header = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $Header );
                        }
                        
                        $Item = $Options->get_setting( 'item' );
                        $Item = dirname( $Options->get_setting( 'file_path' ) )."/res/templates/$Item.tpl";
                        $Item = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $Item );
                        
                        $Footer = $Options->get_setting( 'footer' , '' );
                        if( $Footer !== '' )
                        {
                              $Footer = dirname( $Options->get_setting( 'file_path' ) )."/res/templates/$Footer.tpl";
                              $Footer = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $Footer );
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Header , $Item , $Footer ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )

json_data ( &$  Options  ) 

Function fetches json data.

Parameters:
$Options - Execution parameters.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 591 of file default_views.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $DataProvider = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_data_provider( $Options , $this->Provider );
                        
                        if( method_exists( $DataProvider , 'select' ) === false )
                        {
                              $ClassName = $DataProvider ? get_class( $DataProvider ) : 'undefined_class';
                              throw( new Exception( 'Method "select" was not found in the class "'.$ClassName."'" ) );
                        }
                        
                        $Start = $this->Security->get_gp( 'start' , 'integer' , false );
                        $Limit = $this->Security->get_gp( 'limit' , 'integer' , false );
                        $Field = $this->Security->get_gp( 'field' , 'command' , false );
                        $Order = $this->Security->get_gp( 'order' , 'command' , false );
                        
                        $Records = call_user_func( array( $DataProvider , 'select' ) , $Start , $Limit , $Field , $Order );
                        
                        $Object = new stdClass;
                        set_field( $Object , 'records' , $Records );
                        set_field( $Object , 'count' , count( $Records ) );
                        
                        $JSON = get_package( 'json' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        $this->Provider->Output = $JSON->encode( $Object );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

last_records_form ( &$  Options  )

$Options - Execution parameters.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 693 of file default_views.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $DataProvider = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_data_provider( $Options , $this->Provider );
                        
                        $FunctionName = $Options->get_setting( 'select_func' , 'select' );
                        
                        $Limit = $Options->get_setting( 'records_count' , 3 );
                        
                        $Records = call_user_func( array( $DataProvider , $FunctionName ) , 0 , $Limit , 'id' , 'DESC' );
                        
                        list( $Header , $Item , $Footer ) = $this->get_grid_templates( $Options );
                        
                        $Items = '';
                        
                        foreach( $Records as $i => $Record )
                        {
                              $Items .= $this->String->print_record( $Item , $Record );
                        }
                        
                        $this->Provider->Output = $Header.$Items.$Footer;
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

list_form ( $  Options  ) 

Function draws list of records.

Parameters:
$Options - Execution parameters.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 313 of file default_views.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        /* getting packages */
                        $Paging = get_package( 'gui::paging' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        
                        /* Paging primary initialization */
                        $Paging->set( 'FormId' , $this->Prefix.'_form' );
                        $Paging->set( 'Prefix' , $this->Prefix );

                        /* Header buttons creation */
                        $HeaderFields = 
                              '<input type="hidden" name="{prefix}_context_action" id="{prefix}_context_action" value="">
                              <input type="hidden" name="{prefix}_action" id="{prefix}_action" value="">
                              <input type="hidden" name="{prefix}_record_id" id="{prefix}_record_id" value="">';
                              
                        $Paging->set( 'CustomButtons' , $HeaderFields );

                        $this->build_query_string( $Options );
                        
                        $this->ContextSetUtilities->set_header_template( $Options , $Paging );
                        $this->ContextSetUtilities->set_item_template( $Options , $Paging );
                        $this->ContextSetUtilities->set_no_data_found_message( $Options , $Paging );
                        $this->ContextSetUtilities->set_footer_template( $Options , $Paging );
                        $this->ContextSetUtilities->set_main_settings( $Options , $Paging );
                        $this->ContextSetUtilities->set_grid_data( $Options , $Paging , $this->QueryString );

                        /* compilation */
                        $this->Provider->Output = $Paging->draw( false , $Options );

                        /* Compiling custom buttons */
                        $CommonStateConfig = $Options->get_setting( 
                              'common_state_config_list_buttons' , 'cfcxs_list_buttons'
                        );

                        $ComponentPath = dirname( $Options->get_setting( 'file_path' ) );
                        $CommonStateConfigPath = "$ComponentPath/conf/$CommonStateConfig";
                        if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $CommonStateConfigPath ) )
                        {
                              $Config = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $CommonStateConfigPath );
                              $RecordListSettings->load_settings( $Config );
                              $TemplateFileName = $RecordListSettings->get_setting( 'additional_buttons' );
                              $TemplateFilePath = "$ComponentPath/res/templates/$TemplateFileName";
                              $TemplateContent = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $TemplateFilePath );
                              
                              $this->Provider->Output = str_replace( 
                                    '{list_buttons}' , $TemplateContent , $this->Provider->Output
                              );
                        }
                        
                        $this->process_form( $Options , $this->Provider->Output );

                        $this->Provider->Output = $this->PageComposer->execute_processors( 
                              $this->Provider->Output , 'process_string'
                        );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $Options->get_setting( 'default_form' , 1 ) == 0 )
                        {
                              call_user_func( array( $this->Provider , 'update_form' ) , $Options );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $IdList = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_posted_ids( $this->Prefix );
                              $Record = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_data_record( $Options , $IdList );
                              $Record = $this->ContextSetUtilities->extract_data_from_request(
                                    $Options , $Record , 'get_post_extraction_script' , $this->Prefix
                              );
                              $FormTemplate = $Options->get_setting( 'form_template' , 'update_form' );
                              $Form = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_form( $Options , $IdList , $FormTemplate , $this->Prefix );
                              $this->Provider->Output = $this->ContextSetUtilities->set_form_data( $Form , $Record );
                        }
